r.d: This extension uses libgearman library to provide API for communicating with gearmand, and writing clients and workers.
r.n: - Fixed build issue with 5.1.x - Merged eday changes - Added wait functions, uncommented other worker functions. - Added timeout functions. - Updated function list from C library and removed free methods (should use unset). - Added stubs for new functions, fixed tests, fixed some of the existing functions from changes.
